display_information.name: SpinBot
display_information.description: Randomly selects a user from a thread to decide who's turn it is. Use: @SpinBot who/wer has to...?
display_information.long_description: SpinBot is a fun and fair way to randomly select a user from a Slack thread or channel. Perfect for deciding who has to pre-order lunch, get coffee, or take on any other task. Simply mention @SpinBot in a thread with your task description, and it will randomly pick someone from thread participants (including those who just reacted with üëç, ‚ûï, or ‚úÖ). Also works in channels for team-wide selection with smart status filtering.
